net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AE2_typeDndbWeapon
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Updates the roll expression to be a DnD Beyond weapon attack
The user selects the weapon and the wepon attack bonus and damage expression
are generated from the stored DnD Beyond weapon information

arg(0) = old action type
arg(1) = Working roll expression witn new action type
arg(2) = latest form input

Outputs html content for all of the action steps currently defined
Returns the updated roll expression

Note that no ouput is allowed from this method.
